verses.verse: <S%H7126>"Bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H8432>him,<s%> near to you from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office, even <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> for <S%H3519>glory<s%> and for <S%H8597>beauty.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to all who are <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted,<s%> whom I have <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> that they <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H899>garments<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3547>him,<s%> that he may minister to me in the priest's office.

These are the <S%H899>garments<s%> which they shall <S%H6213>make:<s%> a <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> and an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and a <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of checker <S%H8665>work,<s%> a <S%H4701>turban,<s%> and a <S%H73>sash:<s%> and they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that he may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.
They shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and the <S%H713>purple,<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and the fine <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

"They shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the skillful <S%H2803>workman.<s%>
It shall have <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps <S%H2266>joined<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of <S%H2266>it,<s%> that it may be joined together.

The skillfully woven <S%H2805>band,<s%> which is on <S%H642>it,<s%> that is on <S%H4639>him,<s%> shall be like its work and of the same <S%H2091>piece;<s%> of gold, of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>
You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H6605>engrave<s%> on them the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

<S%H8337>six<s%> of their <S%H8034>names<s%> on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H8337>six<s%> that <S%H3498>remain<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> in the order of their <S%H8435>birth.<s%>

With the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H2796>engraver<s%> in <S%H68>stone,<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> you shall <S%H6605>engrave<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them to be <S%H4142>enclosed<s%> in <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

You shall <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> to be <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4865>settings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%>

and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them like <S%H4020>cords<s%> of <S%H5688>braided<s%> <S%H4639>work:<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5688>braided<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> on the <S%H4865>settings.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H4639>workman;<s%> like the work of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2091>it;<s%> of gold, of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> you shall make <S%H6213>it.<s%>
It shall be <S%H7251>square<s%> and <S%H3717>folded<s%> <S%H2239>double;<s%> a span shall be its <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H2239>it,<s%> and a span its <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

You shall <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H4396>settings<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones:<s%> a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H124>ruby,<s%> <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and <S%H1304>beryl<s%> shall be the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row;<s%>
and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H3095>turquoise,<s%> a <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> and an <S%H5306>emerald;<s%>
and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H3958>jacinth,<s%> an <S%H7618>agate,<s%> and an <S%H306>amethyst;<s%>

and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H8658>chrysolite,<s%> an <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and a <S%H3471>jasper:<s%> they shall be <S%H7660>enclosed<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4396>settings.<s%>

The <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve,<s%> according to their <S%H8034>names;<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> according to his <S%H8034>name,<s%> they shall be for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> on the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8331>chains<s%> like <S%H1383>cords,<s%> of <S%H5688>braided<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> on the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>braided<s%> chains of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> at the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

The other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>braided<s%> chains you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>settings,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> in <S%H4136>its<s%> <S%H6440>forepart.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> on its <S%H8193>edge,<s%> which is toward the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> straps of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4295>underneath,<s%> <S%H4136>in<s%> its <S%H6440>forepart,<s%> close <S%H5980>by<s%> its <S%H4225>coupling,<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

They shall <S%H7405>bind<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by its <S%H2885>rings<s%> to the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> that it may be on the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> may not swing <S%H2118>out<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> when he <S%H935>goes<s%> in to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2146>place,<s%> for a memorial <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim;<s%> and they shall be on <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> when he <S%H935>goes<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue.<s%>

It shall have a <S%H6310>hole<s%> for the <S%H7218>head<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst:<s%> it shall have a <S%H8193>binding<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H6310>hole,<s%> as it were the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of a coat of <S%H8473>mail,<s%> that it not be <S%H7167>torn.<s%>

On its <S%H7757>hem<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and of <S%H713>purple,<s%> and of <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H7757>hem;<s%> and <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> and around <S%H5439>them:<s%>

a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe.<s%>

It shall be on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H8334>minister:<s%> and its <S%H6963>sound<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H935>goes<s%> in to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and when he <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H4191>out,<s%> that he not die.

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6731>plate<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6605>engrave<s%> on <S%H6603>it,<s%> like the engravings of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> 'HOLY TO <S%H3068>YAHWEH.<s%>'
You shall <S%H7760>put<s%> it on a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and it shall be on the <S%H4701>sash;<s%> on the front of the sash it shall <S%H4701>be.<s%>

It shall be on <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall make <S%H6942>holy<s%> in all their <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4979>gifts;<s%> and it shall be <S%H8548>always<s%> on his <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> that they may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H7660>weave<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in checker work of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4701>turban<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H73>sash,<s%> the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H73>sashes<s%> for them and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4021>headbands<s%> for <S%H3519>them,<s%> for glory and for <S%H8597>beauty.<s%>

You shall <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H4886>him,<s%> and shall anoint <S%H4390>them,<s%> and consecrate <S%H6942>them,<s%> and sanctify <S%H3547>them,<s%> that they may minister to me in the priest's office.

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the flesh of their <S%H1320>nakedness;<s%> from the <S%H4975>waist<s%> even to the thighs they shall <S%H3409>reach:<s%>

They shall be on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> when they <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> or when they come <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5375>place;<s%> that they don't bear <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H4191>die:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> to him and to his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>
